incidents.title: NHLViewer beta performance affected
incidents.description: Earlier today, the beta service was affected heavily. I am currently monitoring for further evaluation.
incidents.content: Earlier today, the beta service was affected heavily. I am currently monitoring for further evaluation.

incidents.title: NHLViewer beta upstream issue
incidents.description: We have detected downtime on one of our beta services utilizing Render. You can still use the stable version. Track the incident from Render here: https://status.render.com/incidents/mnmbhg8hl7kd
incidents.content:
We have detected downtime on one of our beta services utilizing Render. You can still use the stable version. Track the incident from Render here: https://status.render.com/incidents/mnmbhg8hl7kd

2022-10-04T01:39:49.000Z
Identified

Render is still working on a fix for the downtime. No ETA at the moment.

2022-10-05T02:52:15.000Z
Resolved

Render has pushed out a fix and the beta service is now operational. If the issue arises again, this will be reopened.

incidents.title: CloudFlare Issue
incidents.description: A CloudFlare issue is impacting the following services.
incidents.content:
A CloudFlare issue is impacting the following services.

2022-06-21T07:21:46.000Z
Monitoring

Issue seems to be somewhat fixed.

2022-06-21T07:44:46.000Z
Resolved

Issue seems to be resolved on CloudFlare's end with my service(s). As a result, I am marking this issue as resolved.

incidents.title: Roblox experiencing issues again

incidents.content:

2022-02-20T09:32:52.000Z
